entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (legacy_darklighter_guard.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_10: Desert Demons. I couldn't do anything to stop them, and they are cleaning the place out.
entries.s_15: It is. The Darklighter clan has been gathering supplies to help them through the tough times.
entries.s_20: What do you mean some agent sent you here and then you destroyed the information in your datapad? Sounds like you need to speak to your agent, not me.
entries.s_22: Sorry. I have things to do.
entries.s_41: They just blew their way in!
entries.s_42: There is a civil war going on, if you hadn't noticed. Supplies and equipment are going to be in short supply for the civilian population. The Darklighters saw this coming and have been accumulating a cache of supplies to help get though these times.
entries.s_43: How much time do we have before it's all cleared out?
entries.s_46: And how long until everything is gone?
entries.s_48: So you are just another looter.
